attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The school that i attand has applied to have part of the disused field cemented over to expand the on site parking for students. Students currently park on the mud but during heavy rain it becames hard to park here. The school has previously applied to have the area paved over but houses that cannot even see the area in question has raised objections. We, the student body, would like to petition to have this overuled as the parking situation would not affect the people in question except for easing on street parking around the school.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
This this is a matter for communication with your local authority.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
